alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Melville Foothills; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 5:17PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...THUNDERSTORMS WITH HEAVY RAIN WILL IMPACT CENTRAL STILLWATER AND CENTRAL SWEET GRASS COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM MDT... At 512 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 20 miles northwest of Columbus to near Big Timber. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Very heavy rainfall and wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Very heavy rainfall may result in localized flooding, locally poor visibility, and ponding of water on area roadways, including portions of I-90 from west of Big Timber to near Columbus. Locations impacted include... Big Timber, Reed Point, Mc Leod, and Greycliff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building or vehicle. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Slow down or pull over to the side of the road when visibility drops significantly. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm.

area.areaDesc: Beartooth Foothills; Melville Foothills; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass
